summary: In 1349, while the Black Plague threatens Germany, the town of Hamelin hires a wandering pied piper (Donovan) to lure rats away with his magic pipe, but then refuses to pay for his services, causing him to lure the town's children away.
cast: Keith Buckley|Patsy Puttnam|Arthur Hewlett|Paul Hennen|Peter Eyre|Donovan|John Hurt|David Leland|Michael Hordern|Jack Wild|Michael Goldie|Diana Dors|Cathryn Harrison|Peter Vaughan|Andre Van Gyseghem|John Falconer|Clive Elliott|Roy Kinnear|Sammie Winmill|Donald Pleasence|John Welsh|David Nettheim|Gertan Klauber|Hamilton Dyce|Roger Hammond|Edwin Brown|George Cormack|Mary MacLeod|Harry Fielder|Sacha Puttnam|Fred Wood
title: El flautista
